ARABIC: إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْتُمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He knows what is said openly and He knows what you hide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He knows surely what you say aloud, and what you hide within your breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed He knows what you say loudly and what you hide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God knows well all that is spoken aloud and all that you hide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed Allah knows whatever is said, and knows all what you conceal.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, He knows that which is spoken aloud and He knows that which you conceal."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely He knows what is spoken openly and He knows what you hide;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely He knows what is spoken aloud and He knows what you hide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! He knoweth that which is said openly, and that which ye conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God surely knows what you say openly and also knows what you conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily He knoweth that which is public in speech, and He knoweth that which ye hide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed He knows whatever is spoken aloud, and He knows whatever you conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is He Who knows what is open in speech and what ye hide (in your hearts).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Say O Muhammad SAW) Verily, He (Allah) knows that which is spoken aloud (openly) and that which you conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He knows your spoken words and what you hide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He knows what is said openly, and He knows what you conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:110] Indeed He, exalted be He, knows whatever is spoken aloud, and what you and others do, and He knows what you conceal, both you and others, of secrets.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! He knoweth that which is said) and done (openly, and that which ye conceal) of words and deeds, just as He knows the time of your chastisement.
